enabled.label: Enable
enabled.comment: Include/exclude category pages in XML Popup.
enabled.tooltip: If 'included', a XML popup containing only 'category' pages will be generated. Once generated, this XML Popup filename will be appended with '_cat' to help you identify that this popup has 'category' pages in it.

changefreq.label: Frequency (Optional)
changefreq.comment: How frequently is the content on the category pages likely to change ?
changefreq.tooltip: This value is only a hint to Search Engines and may not correlate exactly to how often search engines crawl the category pages.

priority.label: Priority (Optional)
priority.comment: The valid range is from 0.0 to 1.0, with 1.0 being the most important.
priority.tooltip: This indicates priority of your category pages relative to all the other pages on the site to Search Engines. Assigning a high priority to all the pages will not help your site's search ranking.

js.comment:
<script type='text/javascript'>

    function addEventObserver(groupId,selectId){
        $$('#'+groupId+' table').each(function(el) {
            el.observe('mouseover', function(ev) {
                fixTooltip(selectId);
            });
        });
        $(selectId).observe('focus', function(ev) {
            fixTooltip(selectId);
        });

        $(selectId).observe('blur', function(ev) {
            fixTooltip(selectId);
        });
    }
    function fixTooltip(selectId){
        var tooltipId = 'row_'+selectId+'_comment';
        var isEnabled = $(selectId).value;

        if (isEnabled == '0'){
            $(tooltipId).setStyle({
            'height': '100%'
            });
        }
    }

 </script> 

                                <script type='text/javascript'>

var groupId = 'popUp_category';
var jsRowId = 'tr#row_'+groupId+'_js';
var selectId = groupId+'_enabled';

hideFields(jsRowId);
addEventObserver(groupId,selectId);

</script>
